name: Topmenu
body:
Welcome to **TopMenu** by Aperture Logic™.

TopMenu is a functionality clone of [PowerMenu](http://www.abstractpath.com/powermenu), but designed to be compatible with Windows 7 and 64-bit systems.  TopMenu is under early development.  It may crash or cause other problems (though I currently use it everyday with only rare issues).

Technical preview version:
* [TopMenu32.msi](https://github.com/jlddodger/TopMenu/blob/master/TopMenu32.msi)
* [TopMenu64.msi](https://github.com/jlddodger/TopMenu/blob/master/TopMenu64.msi)

**Note for x64 users**: Install both files to the same folder
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
